author: G_Webber
title: 2907 STW ST Review.
review:
?Due to how Bickset deals with "gear" this review is for a slightly different model than described.

The 2907 STW ST Clone Trooper kids watch.

This set has 30 pieces and unlike the set listed on brickset (W007-1) does include a clone trooper minifig, as pictured but not described.

In general not really different from the many other Lego kids watches. Probably over-priced for a basic kids watch, but a nice little set and great gift for younger children.

Basic info :

Minifigs : 1 Clone Trooper. http://brickset.com/minifigs/sw128a/Clone-Trooper-Ep-3-Yellow-Markings-No-Pauldron-Star-Corps-Trooper

Set Number On Box : 2907 STW ST.

Pieces : 30.
